statements.name: PROC EXPORT
statements.description: Exports SAS data sets to an external data file.

statements.name: DBENCODING
statements.description: Indicates the encoding used to save data in JMP files.

statements.name: DELIMITER
statements.description: Specifies the delimiter to separate columns of data in the output file.

statements.name: FMTLIB
statements.description: Write SAS format values defined in the format catalog to the JMP file for the value labels.

statements.name: META
statements.description: Writes SAS metadata information to the JMP file. (Deprecated)

statements.name: PUTNAMES
statements.description: Writes SAS variable names as column headings to the first row of the exported data file.
